mapper.sql: t.id, t.event_id, t.event_name, t.entrance_dau, t.entrance_dau_rate, t.entrance_sign, t.entrance_sign_rate, t.entrance_betting, t.entrance_betting_rate, t.entrance_pay, t.entrance_pay_rate, t.entrance_day_retention, t.business_date, t.create_time, t.update_time, t.delete_flag
mapper.select: SELECT FROM dataware_final_entrance_analysis t WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT FROM dataware_final_entrance_analysis t WHERE ORDER BY id desc LIMIT #{start}, #{length}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dataware_final_entrance_analysis t WHERE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dataware_final_entrance_analysis ( id, event_id, event_name, entrance_dau, entrance_dau_rate, entrance_sign, entrance_sign_rate, entrance_betting, entrance_betting_rate, entrance_pay, entrance_pay_rate, entrance_day_retention, business_date, create_time, delete_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{eventId}, #{eventName}, #{entranceDau}, #{entranceDauRate}, #{entranceSign}, #{entranceSignRate}, #{entranceBetting}, #{entranceBettingRate}, #{entrancePay}, #{entrancePayRate}, #{entranceDayRetention}, #{businessDate}, #{createTime}, #{deleteFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE dataware_final_entrance_analysis SET event_id = #{eventId}, event_name = #{eventName}, entrance_dau = #{entranceDau}, entrance_dau_rate = #{entranceDauRate}, entrance_sign = #{entranceSign}, entrance_sign_rate = #{entranceSignRate}, entrance_betting = #{entranceBetting}, entrance_betting_rate = #{entranceBettingRate}, entrance_pay = #{entrancePay}, entrance_pay_rate = #{entrancePayRate}, entrance_day_retention = #{entranceDayRetention}, business_date = #{businessDate}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE dataware_final_entrance_analysis SET delete_flag = 1 WHERE ID = #{id}
